import React from 'react' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import Moment from 'react-moment' const SearchResult = ({ result, submit }) => { return ( <>
{result.length ? Search Results {result.length} : No Search Result} {submit ?
: <> {result.length ? result.map((item, index) => { return ( <>
Result
{item.course_title}
Preview
) }) : ''} }
) } export default SearchResult
